articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Brazil confirms its first monkeypox case - Times of India
articles.description: Rest of World News: BRASILIA: Brazil has confirmed its first case of monkeypox in a 41-year-old man who had traveled to Europe, the health ministry announced Thursday.

articles.title: Ireland U21s secure Euro play-off but boss Crawford insists 'job is far from over' - The42
articles.description: Sweden’s draw with Italy means the Young Boys in Green can still qualify for the European U21 Championships automatically by winning in Ascoli on Tuesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: ECB Plans July Rate Increase as Inflation Problem Deepens - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The European Central Bank laid out plans to increase rates for the first time in more than a decade, joining many of its peers in raising borrowing costs to tackle persistent inflation that is spreading far beyond the U.S.

articles.title: EU rule for common smartphone chargers ‘a victory for consumers’ - Donegal Daily
articles.description: The European Union has agreed on a law to require all new smartphones, tablets and laptops to use a common charger by 2026. The move forces Apple to change connections for new iPhones and AirPod cases from the lightning port to USB-C ports. The EU agreement, …
